doc:
Michael Potts (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Potts_(actor) 0 Michael Potts is an American actor. He is best known for playing the roles of Brother Mouzone in The Wire and Mafala Hatimbi in The Book of Mormon musical. Michael_Potts is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for playing the_roles of Brother_Mouzone in The_Wire and Mafala_Hatimbi in The_Book of Mormon_musical .
